summary: Comprehensive testing completed - Speed Alert Map App caching functionality is working correctly. All backend APIs functional, frontend caching system operational, and UI controls working as expected.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (200 OK)
Speed limit API with San Francisco coordinates (returns 25 mph in 1.4s)
Speed limit API error handling (422 for invalid/missing params)
Speed limit API remote location handling (null for ocean coordinates)
API response time under 20 seconds
Speed limit caching to localStorage with geohash keys
Cache count display updates correctly (0 -> 1 -> 0 -> 1)
Clear cache functionality works (localStorage cleared, count resets to 0)
Cache data structure correct (geohash, speedLimit, unit, roadName, timestamp)
Demo mode enables and fetches speed limits successfully
Speed limit sign displays correct data (25 mph, South Van Ness Avenue)
Settings panel opens and all controls accessible
Audio toggle switch functionality
Voice toggle switch functionality
Voice language selection (English -> Spanish)
Test voice button functionality
Speed unit toggle (MPH/KM/H) switching
Alert threshold slider functionality
Demo mode toggle enables simulation
Offline cache toggle functionality
Cache stats display (cached locations, oldest/newest entry times)
Console logging shows successful caching operations
